Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to communicate.
The student can illustrate how the string stretches between the two cups to send sound.
The student can show that the string is tight, not sagging, to indicate how sound travels.
The student can label that the sound travels through the string to reach the other student.
The student can depict a real-world scenario that involves using this simple device to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate or annotate how using this device helps people communicate without electronics.
The student can draw or describe additional ways people communicate over distances, showing the importance of such technology.
